sentence.Network_en: Teenage conceptions have risen steadily in the last ten years.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去10年中，少女怀孕的现象不断增多。

sentence.Network_en: In the beginning , Chueh - hui had only the haziest conceptions.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是最初他所理解的也不过是一些含糊的概念.

sentence.Network_en: The literary conceptions which prevailed were in consonance with the social structure.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时流行的文学思想是与当时的社会结构相一致的.

概念图( Concept Map) 是康乃尔大学的诺瓦克( J.D. Novak)思维导图的意义和应用  2009-1-8 18:18:51 阅读337 评论0 82009/01 Jan8.

entry.def: A conception of something is an idea that you have of it in your mind.

example.ex: My conception of a garden was based on gardens I had visited in England...
example.tran: 我对花园的概念是基于我在英格兰观赏过的花园。

example.ex: I see him as someone with not the slightest conception of teamwork.
example.tran: 我认为他丝毫没有团队意识。

entry.def: Conception is the forming of an idea for something in your mind.

example.ex: The symphony is admirable in conception...
example.tran: 这支交响乐的构思好极了。

example.ex: The other fundamental consideration in the conception of a plan is function.
example.tran: 在构思设计图时要考虑的另一个基本因素是功能。

entry.def: Conception is the process in which the egg in a woman is fertilized and she becomes pregnant.

example.ex: Six weeks after conception your baby is the size of your little fingernail...
example.tran: 怀孕6个星期后，胎儿的大小相当于小拇指的指甲。

example.ex: Teenage conceptions have risen steadily in the last ten years.
example.tran: 过去10年中，少女怀孕的现象不断增多。
